title: Understanding Spreadsheet Functions
text: In spreadsheets, functions are used to perform calculations or operations on data. Some functions are designed to manipulate data, while others are used for calculations.

title: Filtering Data
text: Filtering data allows you to display only the rows that meet certain criteria, hiding the rest. This is useful for analyzing specific subsets of data.

title: Identifying the Correct Function
text: Consider the functions available in spreadsheets. Which one is specifically designed to filter data based on criteria?
